      void askGrenade()
      Forward the askGrenade method invocation to the client
      boolean askMoveValid​(int row, int column, Directions direction)
      This helper method is used to let the client ask if a single direction is valid, so it doesn't have to know all map adjacences in local, but it just asks the server every time he needs
      void close()
      close the view, displaying a default message, used after the action timer has expired to close the client connection
      void doAction​(JsonAction jsonAction)
      used for actions submitted by the client
      void doFrenzyAtomicShoot()
      This method will ask the player to do the shoot part of the FrenzyShoot
      void doFrenzyReload()
      This method will ask the player to do the reload atomic action for the frenzy shoot
      void endGame()
      This method will show the end game screen
      int getPlayerId()  
      void sendUpdates​(UpdateClass update)
      If the user needs to update the cacheModel, it passes throught this method
      void setValidMove​(boolean b)
      When a user calls askMoveValid with a single direction, the server reply back throught this method if the direction asked is valid (no walls nor out of map)
      void setView​(ToView view)  
      void show​(java.lang.String s)
      Helper method to show messages to the user, if needed, for example if client tries to do an invalid action (even thought some of the checks will be done locally) the controller will let the user redo the whole action and send him a message that contains the reason why he can't
      void spawn​(CachedPowerUp powerUp)
      Forward the PowerUp chosen by the player to discard to spawn

      • show

        public void show​(java.lang.String s)
        Helper method to show messages to the user, if needed, for example if client tries to do an invalid action (even thought some of the checks will be done locally) the controller will let the user redo the whole action and send him a message that contains the reason why he can't

        Parameters:

      • askMoveValid

        public boolean askMoveValid​(int row,
                            int column,
                            Directions direction)
        This helper method is used to let the client ask if a single direction is valid, so it doesn't have to know all map adjacences in local, but it just asks the server every time he needs
        Specified by:
        askMoveValid in interface ViewInterface
        Parameters:
        row - index of the matrix inside the Map
        column - index of the column inside the Map
        direction - Direction (N,S,E,O) where the player wants to move from his current position
        Returns:
        true if the direction is valid, false otherwise

      • setValidMove

        public void setValidMove​(boolean b)
        When a user calls askMoveValid with a single direction, the server reply back throught this method if the direction asked is valid (no walls nor out of map)
        Specified by:
        setValidMove in interface ViewInterface
        Parameters:
        b - true if direction is valid, false otherwise
